
### pipe() and blocking  {.smaller}

<em>BROKEN</em> example: 
```
int pipe_fd[2];
if (pipe(pipe_fd) < 0)
    handle_error();
int read_fd = pipe_fd[0];
int write_fd = pipe_fd[1];
write(write_fd, some_buffer, some_big_size);
read(read_fd, some_buffer, some_big_size);

```
 This is likely to <em>not terminate</em>. What's the problem?
